description.value: A floodslain creature's body is filled with debris from their horrific death, which they can spew at their enemies. The floodslain vomits flotsam in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Any creature in the area takes @Damage[1d8[bludgeoning]] damage per level of the floodslain creature (minimum 1d8) with a @Check[type:reflex|against:fortitude|basic] save against the floodslain's Fortitude DC.
